SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY REPORT

Account ID: ACC_0002

On 2025-12-27, a credit of GBP 811.70 was executed via crypto. The counterparty was a debtor (id: CP_70577). Alert reason: high_risk_country
On 2025-12-30, a credit of GBP 4,652.14 was executed via cash. The counterparty was a debtor (id: CP_51967).
On 2025-12-31, a credit of USD 830.59 was executed via wire. The counterparty was a creditor (id: CP_53469).

PART 2: ACCOUNT SUMMARY
During the reporting period, total debits amounted to 10,849.23 and total credits amounted to 18,917.85. There were 4 debit transactions and 6 credit transactions. Unique creditors: 0; unique debtors: 3. Transactions observed: card, cash, crypto, wire.
